mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Thoburn, Joseph to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thoburn, Joseph
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Va 2 1861. By Telegraph from Mannington 2 1861. We start from here at six thirty (630) AM Col Crosman left here five (5) hours we have no further news J. Thoburn Col Comdg 19h48Co
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Thoburn, Joseph
Mannington, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
